message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You can have less, I'll take the bigger share this time!
You're getting greedy, Bob! I'll give you a bigger share, but not that big!
You're not getting any more generous, am I?
You're getting too greedy, Bob! I'll give you a decent share, but not that big!
You're getting desperate, Alice. This is my best offer.
You're getting too greedy, Bob! I'll give you most of it, but I'm not giving up yet!
